mapper.select: SELECT l.*,u.id as creator_id, u.username as creator_username, u.truename as creator_truename, u.nickname as creator_nickname, sc.id as class_id, s.name as class_schoolName, sc.name as class_name, c.id as course_id, c.name as course_name FROM lesson l INNER JOIN course c ON l.courseId =c.id INNER JOIN school_class sc ON l.classId =sc.id INNER JOIN school s ON sc.schoolId =s.id INNER JOIN user u ON l.createUserId=u.id

SELECT l.*,u.id as creator_id, u.username as creator_username, u.truename as creator_truename, u.nickname as creator_nickname, sc.id as class_id, s.name as class_shoolName, sc.name as class_name, c.id as course_id, c.name as course_name FROM lesson l INNER JOIN course c ON l.courseId =c.id INNER JOIN school_class sc ON l.classId =sc.id INNER JOIN school s ON sc.schoolId =s.id INNER JOIN user u ON l.createUserId=u.id WHERE l.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lesson (courseId, classId, id, name, note,state, createUserId, createTime,startTime,endTime) VALUES( #{courseId}, #{classId}, #{id}, #{name}, #{note},#{state}, #{createUserId}, #{createTime},#{startTime},#{endTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT p.*, s.name as stageName, l.name as lessonName FROM lesson_plan p INNER JOIN course_stage s ON s.id =p.stageId INNER JOIN lesson l ON l.id = p.lessonId WHERE p.lessonId = #{lessonId}

SELECT p.*, s.id as stage_id, s.name as stage_name, l.id as lesson_id, l.name as lesson_name FROM lesson_plan p INNER JOIN course_stage s ON s.id =p.stageId INNER JOIN lesson l ON l.id = p.lessonId WHERE p.lessonId = #{lessonId} AND p.stageId = #{stageId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM lesson_plan WHERE lessonId = #{lessonId} AND stageId = #{stageId}
